Orange bullet points

Just add the o-square-listclass on the root element (ul) of a list. You can get a designed list whose depth is 3 (max).

  • first
    • 1.1
      • 1.1.1
      • 1.1.2
    • 1.2
  • second
  • third
  • fourth
{% highlight html %}
  • first
    • 1.1
      • 1.1.1
      • 1.1.2
    • 1.2
  • second
  • third
  • fourth
{% endhighlight %}
